about_the_game:
Introduction


Fantastic World of Mahjong Princess is a 2D Japanese Mahjong game with adult simulation features. You are a big Mahjong fan who got reincarnated in another world after an incident. In this fantastic realm, you will not only encounter beautiful human ladies, but also be able to have a romance with Succubus, elves, and fairies.

Since the Mahjong game you promoted got super popular among females, you soon became the premier Mahjong tutor. In order to challenge top players all around the world, you must build your own Mahjong battle teams. During this travel, you may train these girls with precious lessons while developing very special relationships between you and them!

Step into this mysterious world and cultivate the top Mahjong Princesses now!

Game Features


  • 1 Vs 1 Japanese Mahjong

  • Unlock the narrative after each game victory

  • Complete chapters to get the monetary reward! You can buy all kinds of toys to Discipline your students, in order to improve their abilities.

  • Get ready to challenge 20 beauties with various personalities and races.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains mildly nudity content and sexually suggestive content, please be aware.

detailed_description:
Introduction


Fantastic World of Mahjong Princess is a 2D Japanese Mahjong game with adult simulation features. You are a big Mahjong fan who got reincarnated in another world after an incident. In this fantastic realm, you will not only encounter beautiful human ladies, but also be able to have a romance with Succubus, elves, and fairies.

Since the Mahjong game you promoted got super popular among females, you soon became the premier Mahjong tutor. In order to challenge top players all around the world, you must build your own Mahjong battle teams. During this travel, you may train these girls with precious lessons while developing very special relationships between you and them!

Step into this mysterious world and cultivate the top Mahjong Princesses now!

Game Features


  • 1 Vs 1 Japanese Mahjong

  • Unlock the narrative after each game victory

  • Complete chapters to get the monetary reward! You can buy all kinds of toys to Discipline your students, in order to improve their abilities.

  • Get ready to challenge 20 beauties with various personalities and races.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct compatible sound card for audio
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and mouse are required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This is a 2D Japanese Mahjong game with adult simulation features. You are a big Mahjong fan who got reincarnated in another world. As the world‘s top Mahjong tutor, you need to build your own team and train your students while developing special relationships with them.
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
